mapper.select:
SELECT A.PNO ,A.PSIZE ,A.QTY ,A.PRICE ,C.PNAME ,C.PINFO ,C.PMAINIMG ,C.PSUBIMG ,B.BUY_DATE ,B.USER_ID FROM PAYMENT A ,PAYMENT_DELIVERY B ,SHOPPING C WHERE A.PAY_ID = B.PAY_ID AND A.PNO = C.PNO
AND B.USER_ID = #{userId}
AND B.BUY_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate} , 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND B.BUY_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{endDate} , 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY BUY_DATE DESC , USER_ID , PNAME , PSIZE
